Class Users

java.lang.Object
BTO.Users
All Implemented Interfaces:
Search<String>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Applicant, Manager
public class Users extends Object implements Search<String>
A base class representing all users in the BTO system. This class encapsulates common user data such as NRIC, name, age, marital status, and role, along with methods for password checking and searching by NRIC. It serves as the parent class for role-specific user types such as:
  • Applicant
  • Officer
  • Manager
Each user is automatically assigned a unique ID. The class also supports ANSI formatting constants for coloured console output.
Version:
16/4/25
Author:
Kah Teck, Keanan, Javier, Junnoske, Kevin
See Also:
  • Applicant
  • Officer
  • This class is intended to be extended rather than used directly.
